message: San Bernardino Police Dept"s Vice Team arrested Anthony Lamar Crawford suspected of pimping and pandering an adult victim. Crawford was booked at the San Bernardino Detention Center and was being held in lieu of $1 million bail. #SBPD #EndHumanTrafficking

data.description: A 38-year-old man who was suspected of pimping and pandering an adult victim in the downtown area of San Bernardino has been arrested, according to the San Bernardino Police Department.
data.title: Man suspected of pimping and pandering an adult victim is arrested in San Bernardino
